data.eml:eml: A new genus of coprophagous water scavenger beetle from Africa (Coleoptera, Hydrophilidae, Sphaeridiinae, Megasternini) with a discussion on the CercyonsubgenusAcycreon

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Arriaga-Varela, Emmanuel, Seidel, Matthias, Fikacek, Martin (2018): A new genus of coprophagous water scavenger beetle from Africa (Coleoptera, Hydrophilidae, Sphaeridiinae, Megasternini) with a discussion on the CercyonsubgenusAcycreon. African Invertebrates 59: 1-23, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/AfrInvertebr.59.14621, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/AfrInvertebr.59.14621
